title: Tom Bilyeu AMA on Tools For Building an Empowering Mindset and Designing Your Passion
description: Tom Bilyeu does a rapid fire AMA (ask me anything) live on Facebook: Topics include: *Using narrative to build a stronger mindset *Tips on managing your emotions *Designing your passion and gaining mastery *Hacks for managing anxiety and depression *Scaling your business without getting into debt *Helping family members with addiction *Building confidence *Advice to college graduates *Tom’s current impactful book *Creating more meaningful friendships *And more...   TOM’S RECOMMENDED BOOKS “Captivate: The Science of Succeeding with People” - http://amzn.to/2sS7UyJ “Barking Up the Wrong Tree: The Surprising Science Behind Why Everything You Know About Success Is (Mostly) Wrong” - http://amzn.to/2ukjuXP “The Dark Tower I: The Gunslinger” - http://amzn.to/2uaJ9lc “Linchpin: Are You Indispensable?”-  http://amzn.to/2veqRfX “The Power of Myth” -  http://amzn.to/2ukE5LN “How to Win Friends & Influence People” - http://amzn.to/2ukEkGH “Mindset: The New Psychology of Success”-  http://amzn.to/2sRIAck   FOLLOW TOM BILYEU TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iyjY5P INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2j7vqX8 FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2hPStWo   DOWNLOAD the 25 Bullet Impact Theory Belief System: http://bit.ly/2ubknRe   SHOP: http://bit.ly/2rtRN8T FACEBOOK GROUP: http://bit.ly/2rg1AjM TOM BILYEU READING LIST: http://bit.ly/2rZdpO9
